price: 30. Ir tikrai, Mes išgelbėjome Israelio (Izraelio) Vaikus nuo žeminančios kančios:
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ نَجَّيۡنَا بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ مِنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلۡمُهِينِ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaqad najjaynā banī is'rāīla mina al-ʿadhābi al-muhīni
